Desc.eng: I knew a pit fighter once who said "Death smiles at us all. All we can do is smile back."
Or we can go out with guns blazing.
I killed the previous Ringmaster in single combat, you know. The crowd cheered my name.
The Ringmaster who got murdered after he caught a gladiator cheating with his wife?
You are lucky that I'm out of shape.
You still can try your luck at acting.
